meanings.sent1: I manducate my breakfast every morning.
meanings.sent2: The hungry squirrel will manducate the nuts in the park.

meanings.definition: To consume or ingest food by chewing and swallowing
meanings.sent1: The baby birds manducate the worms their mother brings.
meanings.sent2: It is important to manducate your food properly for good digestion.
meanings.sent3: The picky eater tried to manducate the broccoli without making a face.
meanings.sent4: The bookworm manducated the words on the page eagerly.
meanings.sent5: The chef manducated the new recipe, imagining the flavors blending together.
